channel.title: CVE Feed for Distributed Data Systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Distributed Data Systems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2254|2024-08-03T00:32:09.466Z -- distributed%20data%20systems -- webhmi
item.description: A user with administrative privileges in Distributed Data Systems WebHMI 4.1.1.7662 can store a script that could impact other logged in users.

item.title: CVE-2022-2253|2024-08-03T00:32:09.451Z -- distributed%20data%20systems -- webhmi
item.description: A user with administrative privileges in Distributed Data Systems WebHMI 4.1.1.7662 may send OS commands to execute on the host server.
